thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 7 of 183
thread.title: Rob Everhart

author: Rob Everhart
title: Rob Everhart
text:
From start to finish, ZipRecruiter was extremely easy to use, and it took no time for candidates to start sending resumes in for our job postings. When I had questions, Leah in the customer service team was extremely helpful and knowledgeable, taking care of my concerns in an extremely professional manner.
I would highly recommend ZipRecruiter to anyone having any type of job to fill.
